rules_text:
When Ill-Fated Seer enters, each player sacrifices a creature. If they can’t, Ill-Fated Seer deals 3 damage to them.
Revive {2}{B}{R} [i]({2}{B}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of this card, except it has no mana cost. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
